meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

vlive.korean: 핸드 메이드 뭔가... 글씨 쓴... 직접 글씨 쓴 그런... It really looks like a hand made... My handwritten note. 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
vlive.english: It really looks like a hand made... My handwritten note.

vlive.korean: 우기 오기 전부터 쓴거 아니야? Didn't I write it before you came? 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 🐭🦒
vlive.english: Didn't I write it before you came?

vlive.korean: 본인이 쓴 노래를 듣는 건가? Is he listening to the song he wrote? 듣기 View video iKON : live
vlive.english: Is he listening to the song he wrote?

vlive.korean: 그리고 또 팬분들께서 저 베레모 쓴 거 다 보셨죠? You all saw me wearing the beret, right? 듣기 View video NCT : 해벌
vlive.english: You all saw me wearing the beret, right?

vlive.korean: 이거 윤형이 형... 윤형이 형이네 - 형이 쓴 거 아니야? It's SONG. - It's you. - You didn't write it? 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: It's SONG. - It's you. - You didn't write it?

examples.english: The flowers of the hop plant add bitterness to the beer. Add to Wordbook
